title: log package misses func Output(calldepth int, s string) error
body:
by **kyrieuon**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. Examine log.go.


What is the expected output?

I would expect to find something like a
 func Output(calldepth int, s string) error
function. It is needed to implement higher level logging functions that are able to
report the correct call location.


What do you see instead?

The required function is missing.


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version go1.1 windows/amd64
